Summary: Object in sky directly above, very bright, moving from north curving to SE heading up to space and disapearing.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ocean Shores
There were no other sightings in Ocean Shores on or around May 20th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out on my deck to have a cigarette, it was about 10minutes after 11:00pm and as I steped outside I looked up as I always do to see if I can see any shooting stars. I imediately saw a very bright light that looked like a star (brighter than venus)I thought it was a plane coming from SeaTac. There were no blinking lights or other colors. There was just a brightness that made it look like a star. There was no sound. Clear skies.I thought for a few seconds that it was a UFO and that it knew I was watching it(when it was directly overhead). The object moved at a curve or toward the southeast above me and the harbor. The light grew dim and up and away it disapeared. I also saw a shooting star seconds after first seeing the object. The shooting star seemed to pass behind the object when it was over and north of my house. I finished my cigarette and came inside and it was 11:15pm. A similar event happened once before, maybe 6 to 8 monthe ago. The object came from a slightly different direction and from a lower initial visual contact and exited at the same point in the night sky.
